game.name: Quichotte: Desktop Knight
game.shortDescription: Zombies. Skeletons. Dragons. Sir Quichotte fights them all on from a small corner of your desktop while you go about your day. Create the most powerful build in this idle auto-battler. Lofi included. Resize him, pin him, or go fullscreen. Your knight, your rules.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Zombies. Skeletons. Dragons. Sir Quichotte fights them all on from a small corner of your desktop while you go about your day. Create the most powerful build in this idle auto-battler. Lofi included. Resize him, pin him, or go fullscreen. Your knight, your rules.
